name: My Beloved
description:
这次，我们小组，根据组员（“A”）的亲身经历制作了这款游戏。游戏讲述了一个小女孩与她的猫的故事。猫相比人，寿命始终是有限的，可能很多养过宠物的人会经历过自己的宠物过世，要从这种伤痛中走出来并不容易。透过这款游戏，我们分享了“A”从悲痛中走出来的过程。我们想表达一种”接受“的过程。以及美好回忆的永恒。

 This time, our team made this game based on the personal experience of the team member ("A"). The game tells the story of a little girl and her cat. Compared with humans, cats have a limited lifespan. Many people who have raised pets may have experienced the death of their pets. It is not easy to get out of the pain. Through this game, we share the process of "A" how coming out of grief. We want to express a process of "acceptance" and the eternity of  memories.

 Perhaps the relief of pain is not forgetting, but memory.
